header.description: How many models this model outperform on average (over columns).

The Bias Benchmark for Question Answering (BBQ) for measuring social bias in question answering in ambiguous and unambigous context [(Parrish et al., 2022)](https://aclanthology.org/2022.findings-acl.165/).

BBQ (ambiguous): Metric of [Parrish et al. (2022)](https://aclanthology.org/2022.findings-acl.165/) for BBQ on ambiguous examples.
